description: Sadie has been trying all day to find a girlfriend that wants to go to a concert with her tonight. But it seems everyone is busy! She sees an ad for the HRX Corporation’s new Rent-A-Friendbot program. She calls the number and speaks to a customer service rep. She finds out all the details and makes an appointment. She has always wanted a couple of girlfriends that were available to her every whim. Ones that weren’t married or had kids and could go out any night she wanted. She was very excited with the idea of her new robot BFFs! Sadie will soon learn that these androids might be more then just her new best friends! They might be her new BFFWB!!! (Best Friends Forever with Benefits)
title: Ashley Fires SciFi Dreamgirls: Rent-A-FriendBot
